Coupon.name: Coupon
Coupon.description: A coupon associated with a promotion.

CouponCode.description: Coupon code for the coupon. A buyer can use the coupon code to qualify for a promotion.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time when the coupon is no longer active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this coupon.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion associated with the coupon.

RedemptionLimitAllBuyers.description: Number of times this coupon can be used in total. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

RedemptionLimitPerBuyer.description: Number of times this coupon can be used per customer. This field is available in API version 61.0 and later.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time when the coupon is active.
